channel.title: Overview on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: BsonDocument
item.description: The BsonDocument class is LiteDB’s implementation of documents. Internally, a BsonDocument stores key-value pairs in a Dictionary<string, BsonValue>. var customer = new BsonDocument(); customer["_id"] = ObjectId.NewObjectId(); customer["Name"] = "John Doe"; customer["CreateDate"] = DateTime.Now; customer["Phones"] = new BsonArray { "8000-0000", "9000-000" }; customer["IsActive"] = true; customer["IsAdmin"] = new BsonValue(true); customer.Set("Address.Street", "Av. Protasio Alves, 1331"); About document field keys: Keys must contains only letters, numbers or _ and - Keys are case-sensitive Duplicate keys are not allowed LiteDB keeps the original key order, including mapped classes.

item.title: Collections
